bookTitle: Foretold: 14 Tales of Prophecy and Prediction
bookAuthors: Carrie Ryan, Richelle Mead, Lisa McMann, Laini Taylor, Meg Cabot, Heather Brewer, Simone Elkeles, Kami Garcia, Michael  Grant, Malinda Lo, Saundra Mitchell, Matt de la Pena, Diana Peterfreund, Margaret Stohl
Plot: Have you ever been tempted to look into the future? To challenge predictions? To question fate? It's human nature to wonder about life's twists and turns. But is the future already written - or do you have the power to alter it? From fantastical prophecies to predictions of how the future will transpire, Foretold is a collection of stories about our universal fascination with life's unknowns and of what is yet to come as interpreted by fourteen of young adult fiction's brightest stars.
Characters: Dimitri Belikov, Rosemarie 'Rose' Hathaway, Matthew Blackgrace
